message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny!
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still thinking $120 is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Can you meet me at that price?
